name: Lab 7: Cold Nights [Demo]
description:
In LAB 7: Cold Nights - wise foresight decides on the outcome of your fate. Wasted coins, reckless use of electricity, and poor time management will lead to your demise. Explore your surroundings, build defenses and find a way to freedom.

  • An action packed strategy & resource management game featuring minimalist adventure elements in a 2D sidescroller world.
  • Find a path to freedom as you defend yourself with defenses, weapons, and chemicals against defiant victims of the lab.

X-BOX controller highly recommended! You can also play with Keyboard.

Press F1 or START to see controls.

Original Website https://www.lab7-coldnights.com/
